texture.description: Path to the base colour texture relative to the textures directory, or "$DEFAULT_DIFFUSE". Must be an RGBA texture encoded in BC1/3/7. Recommended: BC1_UNORM_SRGB for OPAQUE, BC3_UNORM_SRGB for BLEND or MASK. Premultiplied alpha is currently not considered.

strength.description: RGBA multiplier for the entire texture in linear space. TODO: consider tinting.
